name: SimCity 4 Description File
summary: Learn about .SC4DESC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SC4DESC files are often used for creating custom properties for a lot, which is stored in an .SC4LOT file. SC4DESC files are created using the Plug-in Manager program, which is part of Electronic Arts' Building Architect Tool suite. They may also be edited with the SC4Tool and iLives Reader.

description: Game description file used by SimCity 4, a city-building and simulation game; describes game properties such as the location and type of buildings and props; also specifies how people in the city interact with the buildings.
